Close the parser, signaling end of input.
compact() - Method in class org.bluezoo.util.CompositeByteBuffer
Compacts this buffer by moving unread bytes to the underflow buffer.
CompositeByteBuffer - Class in org.bluezoo.util
A composite ByteBuffer that provides a unified view over two underlying ByteBuffers: an underflow buffer (for leftover bytes from previous processing) and a data buffer (for new incoming data).
CompositeByteBuffer() - Constructor for class org.bluezoo.util.CompositeByteBuffer
Creates a new composite byte buffer with a default minimum growth size of 256 bytes for the underflow buffer.
CompositeByteBuffer(int) - Constructor for class org.bluezoo.util.CompositeByteBuffer
Creates a new composite byte buffer with the specified minimum growth size for the underflow buffer.
